phrs.translation: 阿卡德帝国, 阿卡德王朝

sentences.sentence: Akkadian was written with the cuneiform writing system, on clay tablets, and was in use from the beginning to about 750 b. c.
sentences.translation: 阿卡德语被作为书写在粘土板上的楔形文字，从最初一直被使用到公元前750年。

sentences.sentence: Akkadian was written with the cuneiform writing system, on clay TAB lets, and was in use from the beginning to ab out 750 b. C.
sentences.translation: 阿卡德语被作为书写在粘土板上的楔形文字，从最初一直被使用到公元前750年。
